items.text: Point Cost: The number of committed points that students must spend to register to buy tickets to participate in the event
Higher point costs indicate more important or exclusive events
Students will be refunded their ticket purchase points after meeting the pre-event check-in and mid-event check-in requirements
Students will receive additional reward points after completing the pre-event check-in, mid-event check-in, and post-event check-in requirements
Budget Points: The total budget points allocated by the university to the event fund to support event organization expenses
Budget points are used to cover reward points for participants who attend the entire duration of the event
Unused budget points will be returned to the club after the event
Budget must be justified with detailed expense breakdown for approval

footer.text: For questions or clarifications, please contact University Staff or refer to the full event management handbook.
